title: RADS Error
body:
I try opening League up, and I get the error message. "RADS Error: Unspecified error occurred, please check the logs for more information.
This is what I get:

 (   USER)[17:12:09.583] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Riot Application Distribution System (c) 2010 Riot Games (version 1.0.0.228)
(   USER)[17:12:09.583] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Running at 17:12:09 on 09/28/2017
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.584] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Command line: "updateandrun lol_launcher LoLLauncher.exe"
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.584] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Executed from root folder with correct name, not an update.
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.584] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::HTTPConnection: (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.584] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Connect: (http://l3cdn.riotgames.com)
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.585] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: ("/releases/live/system/rads_user_kernel.exe.version", "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp\TMP114A.tmp", RETRY, 0x00000000)
(  ERROR)[17:12:09.601] RADS::UserKernel::`anonymous-namespace'::ParseVersionFile: Invalid version.
(  ERROR)[17:12:09.601] RADS::UserKernel::Application::SelfUpdate: Failed parse the downloaded version file.
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.601] RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::Disconnect: ()
(  ERROR)[17:12:09.601] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: SelfUpdate failed.
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.609] RADS::User::ManagedFileHelper::Release: 
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.609] RADS::UserKernel::Application::Run: Returning 0x80004005
(  DEBUG)[17:12:09.609] RADS::Common::ErrorMessageMap::ErrorMessageMap: locale: en_us
(   USER)[17:12:09.609] WinMain: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

this started happening after I reinstalled, but before that, it kept telling me it was going to revert to an older version then back, and restart, but it was in an infinite loop so I decided to reinstall, but then the RADS Error occurred. I've looked everywhere and no solutions.

replies.body: Most of the time those RADS errors mean that League is having problems pulling on the game files it needs to in order to run correctly. Typically we can fix that up easily enough by making sure you have all the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) settings, so check that guide and let me know if it helps.
